description: Auto-llamas will claim the free upgradable llamas or purchase llama if there is at least one legendary/mythic survivor on the selected accounts.
note1: <0>1</0> If there's at least one free upgrade llama available it will be claimed.
note2: <0>2</0> You can also enable the purchase of an upgrade llama (50 V-Bucks) if you want. This purchase will only be made if there's at least one legendary or mythic survivor.
note3: <0>3</0> You can choose whether to use an X-Ray Tickets or a llama token (Default: X-Ray).
